description: List memberships with filtering and pagination.

flags.description: Filter by default job production plan subscriber (true/false)
flags.name: --is-default-job-production-plan-subscriber

flags.description: Filter by equipment rental team member (true/false)
flags.name: --is-equipment-rental-team-member

flags.description: Filter by geofence violation team member (true/false)
flags.name: --is-geofence-violation-team-member

flags.description: Filter by time card auditor status (true/false)
flags.name: --is-time-card-auditor

flags.description: Filter by unapproved time card subscriber (true/false)
flags.name: --is-unapproved-time-card-subscriber

permissions: Requires authorization via MembershipPolicy scope; non-admin access is limited by each membership-type policy scope.
validation_notes: Validation: --organization must be in Type|ID format (e.g., Broker|123); --kind must be operations or manager; --drives-shift-type must be any/day/night; boolean filters accept true/false (is-rate-editor, is-time-card-auditor, is-equipment-rental-team-member, is-geofence-violation-team-member, is-unapproved-time-card-subscriber, is-default-job-production-plan-subscriber).
